name: durgasos
description: A sophisticated web-based operating system that replicates Windows 11

scripts.electron:dev: cd electron && npm install && npm start
scripts.electron:build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && npm install && npm run build
scripts.electron:build:win: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && npm run build:win
scripts.electron:build:mac: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && npm run build:mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && npm run build:linux

author: DurgasOS
